post.text:
Tamil Nadu Chief Minister 
@mkstalin
 reaffirmed his opposition to the NEP 2020, accusing the Union government of coercion and undermining #TamilNadu's education system. He rejected its implementation, saying the state won't do it even if offered Rs 10,000 crore.

Story by 
@PramodMadhav6
 - 
intdy.in/1xm9j1

All you've ensured is, the rest of the country won't offer Tamil as a 3rd Lang.

Now dmk bots will say they don't care. 
Dont bother..We know you don't actually care about Tamil or Tamilian students.
Do we see a stout hearted leader forming right in front of our eyes?
DMK founder says Tamil a barbaric and savage language. The DMK founder EVR also advicated killing and murdering all Tamil Hindu brahmins.

If u don’t want to implement the NEP don’t do it. Who is forcing u to do. If u don’t implement it, the project fund will not be released as the project NEP is not implemented. Simple. 

So keep quiet and go to sleep.

Accepted NEP, said to have drawn two installments of funds. Now reneges on implementation of NEP but wants more funds, funds tied with NEP.

DMK can reject NEP. But cannot simultaneously claim funds contingent on adoption of NEP.
He asked 2100 crores in the first place and now says he wouldn't do it even if 10k crore is offered. Then don't worry about 2100k and just move on

Adament behaviour for progress.He needs to implmnt an education for students glorifying islamic rulers periyar based hate Hindu syllabus. Union cn introduce NEP& Hindi  subject in kendriya vidyalaya CBSEsyllabus from primary classes where it has hold.He Nvr permit mekedhatu prjct

Political leaders should stay away from meddling with education system. Its like Bhasmasurahastam, for it rottens the society and destroys entire nation. #Stopmeddlingwitheducation
#Dontplaywitheducation
But bega for 2150 crs

Nothing better than Mother Tongue for day to day communication and early age education. Nothing better than English for official communication and higher/professional level education. Ignore those who mess around with narrow politics of a three language formula.
Then why he asked to release the funds
He should be arrested for disobedience

@dpradhanbjp
 give our money back, or leave us alone. Don't steal our money. Union govt theif
New form of partition in the name of language. Last time we divided us within India. We got ruled by external countries.if we do not learn from history we will keep repeating the mistake.

Good job 
@mkstalin

Look at the audacity. The samachir syllabus is so bad and lagging compared to CBSE. These D stocks are only worried that keeping ppl away from Hindi will make them aware of happenings and national pride will arise. They just want ppl to be slaves of their family.
Ek taraf ka muh latak gaya hai ...
State won't do it for 10,000 crore but  if offered a higher amount then

Seriously question the followers of this "Stalin", falling to the political pranks of making a language issue that is not even there. 
Hindi, or any language, doesn't need Tamilnadu for its prosperity. Embracing a language should be the discretion of students not politicians.
Then why are they creating issue. Reject it and don't accept funds. Simple
Put this idiot in jail. And get rid of his entire government. It’s time to really get rid of such dumb idiots.
Stop Hindi imposition
Wdym by NAGPUR scheme??

Don't accept.
TN youngsters are denied of their rights.

People say TN only has problem. If NEP ensures mother tongue why Punjab, Telangana and Kerala has to make state language compulsory. Why Telangana BJP officially not opposing it ? When Karnataka says no hindi only kannada and No NEP from next year. WB also has issue.
Stop sending tax money to New Delhi.

Thank you 
@mkstalin
 . Now your state quota of funds can be used for other useful purposes. You can generate your funds by selling more liquor through your corrupt Tasmac 
BTW, nobody is giving you 10000 crores!
So why is he begging for 2000 crores?
Tamilnadu's asking it's share of taxes which it paid to union govt.

This crappy politicians won’t take away reverence of Hindi. It’s a language spoken and understood by large number of Indians. Language of about utility. As reiterated by ChandraBabu Naidu , teach more languages. We have options of German and French too, no one gave issue with it.
Hahaha. Let the TASMAC scam blow up,, then see the thenavattu of this statement will remain intact or what!!!

This is not about politics.  Here we need to think of the future of children of this land.  Here there is no competition to win.  But the welfare and life of the poor children who wants to grow and shine in this world.  Who are you to deny this.
Order him out on gxxnpoixxt
Failed CM and pathological lair .
Kudos to the CM for standing strong.
